software.name: Agent
software.description: Performs simple tasks like calendar, reminders, and simple instructions.

software.name: Analysis
software.description: Performs in-depth analysis of data streams, scientific readings, or information networks.

software.name: Battle
software.description: Assists in tactical coordination and gives bonuses to command-related checks.

software.name: Comms
software.description: Controls communications for networks, encrypts or decrypts transmissions.

software.name: Evade
software.description: Attempts to spoof or hide electronic signals. Useful for stealth and ECM tasks.

software.name: Expert-1
software.description: Acts as a virtual assistant with a single skill at level 1.

software.name: Expert-2
software.description: Acts as a virtual assistant with a single skill at level 2.

software.name: Expert-3
software.description: Acts as a virtual assistant with a single skill at level 3.

software.name: Intellect
software.description: Simulates an intelligent personality. Grants +1 to skill rolls in designated domains.

software.name: Library
software.description: Offline database of general knowledge. Useful for Education-related checks.

software.name: Translate
software.description: Translates written and spoken languages. May be unreliable with unknown dialects.

software.name: Firewall
software.description: Protects against intrusion. Acts as security software for computers and networks.

software.name: Intrusion
software.description: Software designed to break through security protocols and firewalls.
